languages.text: Судно заходит на таран, проносясь сквозь корабль Вольного Торговца — и на мостике возникают туманные образы истлевших обезображенных людей. Истерзанные крики их душ заглушают мысли, а образы прошлого смешиваются с видениями настоящего... Мертвые глаза видят в живых проклятых ксеносов, и призрачные пиломечи и болтеры обрушиваются на команду, выбивая дух из перепуганных офицеров. Наваждение рассеивается густой синеватой дымкой так же внезапно, как и появилось, оставив в память о себе седину у нескольких особо впечатлительных членов экипажа.

traits.locale_text: Судно заходит на таран, проносясь сквозь ваш корабль — и на мостике возникают туманные образы истлевших обезображенных людей. Истерзанные крики их душ заглушают мысли, а образы прошлого смешиваются с видениями настоящего... Мертвые глаза видят в ваших людях проклятых ксеносов, и призрачные пиломечи и болтеры обрушиваются на команду, выбивая дух из перепуганных офицеров. Наваждение рассеивается густой синеватой дымкой так же внезапно, как и появилось, оставив в память о себе седину у нескольких особо впечатлительных членов экипажа.

languages.text: The cruiser rams the Rogue Trader's voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present. The dead see the living as treacherous xenos, attacking the crew with ghostly chainswords and bolters, knocking the wind out of the terrified officers. The apparition dissipates into thick blue mist just as suddenly as it appeared, leaving behind only several strands of grey hair among the most impressionable crew members.
languages.original_text: Судно заходит на таран, проносясь сквозь корабль Вольного Торговца — и на мостике возникают туманные образы истлевших обезображенных людей. Истерзанные крики их душ заглушают мысли, а образы прошлого смешиваются с видениями настоящего... Мертвые глаза видят в живых проклятых ксеносов, и призрачные пиломечи и болтеры обрушиваются на команду, выбивая дух из перепуганных офицеров. Наваждение рассеивается густой синеватой дымкой так же внезапно, как и появилось, оставив в память о себе седину у нескольких особо впечатлительных членов экипажа.

traits.locale_text: The cruiser rams your voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. Tormented cries of these souls drown out thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with the sights of the present. Dead eyes see your people as the treacherous xenos, so ghostly chainswords and bolters attack your crew, knocking the wind out of the terrified officers. The apparition dissipates into thick blue mist just as suddenly as it appeared, leaving behind only several strands of grey hair among the most impressionable crew members.

The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present. Dead eyes see your people as treacherous xenos, attacking your crew with ghostly chainswords and bolters, knocking the wind out of the terrified officers. The apparition dissipates into thick blue mist just as suddenly as it appeared, leaving behind only several strands of grey hair among the most impressionable crew members.

The cruiser rams your voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present. Dead eyes see your people as treacherous xenos, attacking your crew with ghostly chainswords and bolters, knocking the wind out of the terrified officers. The apparition dissipates into thick blue mist just as suddenly as it appeared, leaving behind only several strands of grey hair among the most impressionable crew members.

The cruiser rams the Rogue Trader's voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present. The dead see the living as treacherous xenos, attacking the crew with ghostly chainswords and bolters, knocking the wind out of the terrified officers. The apparition dissipates into thick blue mist just as suddenly as it appeared, leaving behind only several strands of grey hair among the most impressionable crew members.

languages.text: 这艘巡洋舰撞向了你的虚空舰，直接从中穿过。舰桥上满是腐烂和毁容之人的模糊面孔。这些灵魂痛苦的呼喊淹没了所有思想，过去与现在交织在一起。那些死者把你的人视为奸诈的异形，用没有实体的链锯剑与爆矢枪攻击你的船员，让那些受惊的军官吓得喘不过气来。随后，这艘幽灵船就仿佛它出现时那样，突然消散在厚重的蓝色雾气中，只在那些受惊最严重的头上留下了几缕白发。
languages.original_text: The cruiser rams your voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present. Dead eyes see your people as treacherous xenos, attacking your crew with ghostly chainswords and bolters, knocking the wind out of the terrified officers. The apparition dissipates into thick blue mist just as suddenly as it appeared, leaving behind only several strands of grey hair among the most impressionable crew members.

traits.locale_text: 这艘巡洋舰撞向了你的虚空舰，直接从中穿过。舰桥上满是腐烂和毁容之人的模糊面孔。这些灵魂痛苦的呼喊淹没了所有思想，过去与现在交织在一起。那些死者把你的人视为奸诈的异形，用没有实体的链锯剑与爆矢枪攻击你的船员，让那些受惊的军官吓得喘不过气来。随后，这艘幽灵船就仿佛它出现时那样，突然消散在厚重的蓝色雾气中，只在那些受惊最严重的头上留下了几缕白发。
这艘巡洋舰撞向了你的虚空舰，直接从中穿过。舰桥上满是腐烂和毁容之人的模糊面孔。这些灵魂痛苦的呼喊淹没了所有思想，过去与现在交织在一起。那些死者把你的人视为奸诈的异形，用没有实体的链锯剑与爆矢枪攻击你的船员，让那些受惊的军官吓得喘不过气来。随后，这艘幽灵船就仿佛它出现时那样，突然消散在厚重的蓝色雾气中，只在那些受惊最严重的头上留下了几缕白发。

languages.text: 巡洋艦はヴォイドシップに体当たりして通り抜け、ブリッジには腐敗し醜形を呈した人々のぼやけた顔があふれている。苦悩に満ちた魂の叫びがあらゆる思考をかき消し、過去の幻影が現在の幻影と交錯する。死人の目は、あなたの仲間を裏切り者の異種族と見なし、影のようなチェーンソードやボルターであなたのクルーを襲い、恐怖に怯える士官たちを強烈に吹き飛ばす。その幻影は、現れたときと同じように突然、濃く青い霧となって消え去り、印象深いクルーの数本の白髪だけが後に残された。
languages.original_text: The cruiser rams your voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present. Dead eyes see your people as treacherous xenos, attacking your crew with ghostly chainswords and bolters, knocking the wind out of the terrified officers. The apparition dissipates into thick blue mist just as suddenly as it appeared, leaving behind only several strands of grey hair among the most impressionable crew members.

巡洋艦はヴォイドシップに体当たりして通り抜け、ブリッジには腐敗し醜形を呈した人々のぼやけた顔があふれている。苦悩に満ちた魂の叫びがあらゆる思考をかき消し、過去の幻影が現在の幻影と交錯する。死人の目は、あなたの仲間を裏切り者の異種族と見なし、影のようなチェーンソードやボルターであなたのクルーを襲い、恐怖に怯える士官たちを強烈に吹き飛ばす。その幻影は、現れたときと同じように突然、濃く青い霧となって消え去り、印象深いクルーの数本の白髪だけが後に残された。

languages.text: El crucero embiste la nave del vacío, atravesándola, y el puente se llena de visiones borrosas de personas descompuestas y desfiguradas. Los gritos atormentados de estas almas ahogan todos los pensamientos, y las visiones del pasado se entremezclan con las del presente. Los ojos muertos ven a tu gente como xenos traidores que atacan a tu tripulación con espadas sierra y bólters fantasmales, dejando sin aliento a los aterrorizados oficiales. La aparición se disipa en una espesa niebla azul tan repentinamente como apareció, dejando tras de sí solo varios mechones de pelo gris entre los miembros más impresionables de la tripulación.
languages.original_text: The cruiser rams your voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present. Dead eyes see your people as treacherous xenos, attacking your crew with ghostly chainswords and bolters, knocking the wind out of the terrified officers. The apparition dissipates into thick blue mist just as suddenly as it appeared, leaving behind only several strands of grey hair among the most impressionable crew members.

languages.text: Der Kreuzer rammt dein Raumschiff, fliegt direkt durch es hindurch, und die Brücke füllt sich mit verschwommenen Bildern von verwesten und entstellten Personen. Die gepeinigten Rufe dieser Seelen übertönen alle deine Gedanken, und Visionen der Vergangenheit vermischen sich mit denen der Gegenwart. Tote Augen sehen dein Volk als verräterische Xenos, greifen deine Crew mit gespenstischen Kettenschwertern und Boltern an, werfen die verängstigten Offiziere um. Die Erscheinung löst sich ebenso plötzlich, wie sie aufgetaucht ist, in einen dichten blauen Nebel auf. Zurück bleiben nur einige Strähnen frisch ergrauter Haare auf den Köpfen der sensibelsten Crewmitglieder.
languages.original_text: The cruiser rams your voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present. languages.text: Le vaisseau fantôme percute celui {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre marchande} en passant à travers et la passerelle se remplit de visages décomposés et défigurés aux contours flous. Les cris tourmentés de ces âmes en peine noient toute pensée, et des visions du passé s'entremêlent avec celles du présent. Les morts perçoivent les vivants comme des traîtres xénos et les fantômes attaquent à grand renfort d'épées tronçonneuses et de bolters spectraux, coupant le souffle des officiers terrifiés. Puis, l'apparition se dissout en une épaisse brume bleue aussi soudainement qu'elle est apparue, ne laissant dans son sillage que quelques mèches de cheveux grisâtres chez les membres les plus crédules de l'équipage.
languages.original_text: The cruiser rams the Rogue Trader's voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present. The dead see the living as treacherous xenos, attacking the crew with ghostly chainswords and bolters, knocking the wind out of the terrified officers. The apparition dissipates into thick blue mist just as suddenly as it appeared, leaving behind only several strands of grey hair among the most impressionable crew members.

languages.text: Kruvazör, Hür Tacir'in uçsuz gemisine mahmuzuyla çarparak geminin tam içinden geçiyor. Köprü, çürümüş ve biçimini kaybetmiş insanların bulanık görüntüleriyle doluyor. Bu ruhlardan yükselen eziyet dolu feryatlar, tüm düşünceleri bastırıyor. Geçmişin görüleriyse şimdiki görülerle iç içe geçiyor. Ölüler, yaşayanları hain zenolar olarak görüp onlara hayaletvari motorlu kılıçlar ve bulonatarlarla saldırıyor. Dehşete kapılan subayların nefeslerini kesiyorlar. Heyula, dağılarak yoğun bir mavi sise dönüşüyor ve ortaya çıkışı gibi aniden ortadan kayboluyor. Geride en hassas mürettebatın saçlarında yer edinen birkaç gri saç telinden başka bir şey bırakmıyor.
languages.original_text: The cruiser rams the Rogue Trader's voidship, passing right through it, and the bridge fills with blurry visages of decomposed and disfigured people. The tormented cries of these souls drown out all thoughts, and visions of the past intertwine with those of the present.
